comments.wellwillya: Some encouraging form this season after switch to fences; faced very tough task last time

races.raceComment: dearralphy is marginally preferred with a score of 53.1%, holding clear edges in stronger recent form and superior course form and more reliable profile over abbeyhill. Key attributes include excellent form, though returning from absence and inconsistent profile and regressive form need consideration.

comments.madmaxios: Fifth foal from well-connected mare; has good standard to reach on debut; still considered

form.raceInstanceTitle: Paul Ferguson Jumpers To Follow Handicap Chase
form.rpCloseUpComment: in rear, headway before 2 out, never near to challenge nudged out (an inquiry was held into running and riding; rider and trainer were interviewed; vet examined gelding which was selected for routine testing on two occasions post-race and had nothing to report; having initially failed to report anything when passing scales post-race, jockey said several minutes after having been informed that he was required to attend an inquiry into ride on gelding, that gelding had made a respiratory noise during race; jockey said his instructions were to ride gelding at rear of field, get him settled and creep into race with the aim of making a late challenge as gelding has not been seeing his races out; he continued that gelding jumped and travelled well up until 3rd last fence where it began to make the aforementioned noise; however, it was from this point on that gelding began to make both steady and eyecatching progress under sympathetic handling and jockey justified his apparent lack of effort by reiterating the fact that gelding is a weak finisher, and it was his intention to get there as late as possible for this reason, but on this occasion having jumped the last fence gelding emptied out again; trainer said his instructions were to ride gelding with restraint and to get there late; having become aware of the respiratory noise trainer said that he was satisfied with ride and that he would have gelding seen by a vet regarding his  respiratory issue;)

verdict.comment: The suggestion is LAGONDA (nap), who ran very well in a competitive C&D mares' race in December and returns here after a recent win.

comments.almazhargarde: Second three times off this mark in the autumn; returns from three-month break today
comments.bornatmidnight: Won twice at Plumpton last March but has been out of form there this season
comments.capdunord: Won off 7lb higher last summer but recent efforts have been very disappointing
comments.champagnesuperover: Heavily backed last time but unseated rider; remains very well handicapped on old form
comments.christopherwood: Inconsistent and regressive 10yo; well beaten last month; blinkers tried here
comments.foxboro: Four-time chase winner for Robert Walford but out of form for new stable this season
comments.grillondemonty: Struggled on both hurdling starts for new stable this winter; now back over fences
comments.lagonda: Second in valuable C&D mares' race in December and made all at Bangor this month; a player
comments.tidetimes: Useful in his prime but has been out of sorts for a good while now

races.raceComment: lagonda is confidently preferred with a score of 61.2%, holding clear edges in better suited by conditions and stronger recent form and superior course form and more progressive and more reliable profile over almazhargarde. Won 1 of last 6 starts. Ground (Good To Soft) looks ideal with 4 wins from 20 starts in similar conditions. Strong pace likely with multiple front-runners. Key attributes include excellent form and strong course form and improving.

verdict.comment: Chasing newcomer MINNIEMUM ran well off this mark in a competitive hurdle last time and is an alternative to Jo Lescribaa.

comments.hautfolin: Seemingly deserted by Charlie Deutsch after a disappointing run last time out
comments.irondex: 1-5 over fences; looking handicapped about right but has an each-way chance
comments.jolescribaa: Has made all for his recent wins and looks progressive; raised 8lb for last time
comments.micromillions: Ability for Dan Skelton but minor form in three chase starts for current operation
comments.minniemum: Chasing newcomer who has finished closer in each of her hurdle runs this season
comments.pawpaw: Probably wants drier ground and none too reliable these days at the best of times
comments.shillanavogy: Up and down but wouldn't put it past him to bounce back and he stays this far
comments.whatatime: Has shown pretty much zilch in two runs over fences, both handicaps

races.raceComment: jolescribaa is marginally preferred with a score of 57.7%, holding clear edges in stronger recent form over hautfolin. Won 2 of last 5 starts. Strong pace likely with multiple front-runners. Key attributes include positive comments, though inconsistent profile need consideration.

verdict.comment: Watch the betting but as things stand PEARL SMOKE is preferred over Hay Macleod and Donttellyamumjack.

comments.bohemondantioch: Modest form so far and no surprise should one of the newcomers have his measure
comments.deauvillelady: Dam 1m 2yo winner in Germany and fairly useful hurdler/chaser for these connections
comments.donttellyamumjack: Half-brother to six winners, including useful Flat performers and a bumper winner
comments.emeraldwarrior: Dam second in a bumper and a half-sister to top-class chaser Simonsig
comments.forthfactor: Dam a point winner and stable's bumper runners are commanding a second look this season
comments.haymacleod: Â£60,000 3yo; fourth foal; half-brother to 2m hurdle winner Hawk Stone
comments.oursupersix: Bought for 20,000gns as a 3yo but he has a high-class Flat pedigree
comments.pearlsmoke: Sister to 3m chase winner Pearl Island; dam 2m6f-3m hurdle winner

races.raceComment: bohemondantioch is marginally preferred with a score of 19.9%, holding clear edges in better ratings over deauvillelady. Going is a significant concern - yet to win on Good To Soft ground from 2 attempts. Key attributes include improving, though returning from absence and step up in class and inconsistent profile need consideration.
